synopsis.text: One sunny day, Hiyori, a young girl with a passion for fishing instilled by her late father, finds solace at the sea to calm her nerves about meeting her new stepfamily. There, she encounters Koharu, a lively girl with a keen interest in learning to fish. As they bond over their shared activity, a surprising revelation emerges: both girls are about to meet their new families that very evening. Little did they know, fate has intertwined their lives as they are set to become stepsisters. Join Hiyori and Koharu as they embark on a heartwarming journey of sisterhood, fishing, and cherished memories.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
